title: riot you donkey, i cant change password
body:
If you're asking me to enter a verification code that you sent to my email to enter my account settings after getting the username and password right from the first try, the least you can do is send that fucking verification code you donkey

https://i.imgur.com/M4WbpDh.png

replies.body: I did this a few days ago on my Gmail and it worked instantaneously. Do you have several Gmail?
i checked every sub categories of mail its nowhere
Gmail is probably binning it, typical for them.
you arent getting the code? Have you checked spam? Sometimes it might be there
